summary: A documentary portrait that takes us into Jonathan Gold's universe to tell the improbable story of a revolution inspired by the pen, but driven by the palate.
cast: David Chang|Roy Choi|Jonathan Gold|Ludo Lefebvre|Peter Meehan|John Powers|Ruth Reichl|Allen Salkin|Robert Sietsema|Calvin Trillin|Garth Trinidad|Andrew Zimmern
keywords: antomtas carmen|reference to raymond chandler|ethnic food|street performer|food truck
title: City of Gold
